title: Mu-Sharet Burial Ground
description: Burial ground with 25 graves in 11 mounds located 10km Northeast of Manych, Kalmykia. These graves are largely from the Bronze Age and early Copper Age with some early Iron Age and Medieval graves also present.

properties.description: Point based on an OpenStreetMap node representing Mu-Sharet Burial Ground after TSitskin 2001.
properties.title: OSM location of Mu-Sharet Burial Ground
